ReferenceFont Class Reference

Used by Job to realize a font. More...

Inherits Font.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Subclass ReferenceFont (EnumFont) is used to query available font properties prior to instantiating the font. Whereas Font objects created upon request are to be deleted by caller, ReferenceFonts live with the core structures and cannot be deleted.

The main purpose of this class is to hide the destructor, since the fonts that live with the Printer and are returned by EnumFont are meant to remain alive for the life of the Printer.

See also:
Font Printer
